description: We, here at Kink.com, are proud to bring you the one, the only, Aria Giovanni! This incredibly beautiful, sexy woman gave us the honor of submitting to our watery tortures. Isis Love was kind enough to step in to Dom our lovely guest and the two of them together on screen are almost a sensory overload! Professional, intelligent and down-to-earth, Aria was as pleasant to work with as she is gorgeous. Thank you very much Aria Giovanni, for coming to play with us! See more of Aria here. And be sure to check out Behind Kink's coverage of Aria's day at Waterbondage.
title: Waterbondage Exclusive! Aria Giovanni is here!
